name: SolutionStatus
description: Represents the status of a solution.
summary: The object {SolutionStatus} in the Salesforce application is used to track the status of solutions within the sales process. It provides information on the current status of a solution, such as whether it has been approved, rejected, or is pending approval. This object helps sales teams keep track of the progress of their solutions and ensure that they are being properly managed and followed up on.
label: Solution Status Value
